author: @e1e5en
description:
Detect swipe gestures based on their distance and duration

Use the "Detect swipe gestures" action once at the beginning of your scene.

Expressions:
- `StartPointX`, `StartPointY`: Coordinates of the point where the swipe starts
- `EndPointX`, `EndPointY`: Coordinates of the swipe end point
- `Distance`: Length of the swipe, in pixels
- `DistanceX`, `DistanceY`: Distance the swipe moved in each axis
- `Angle`: Direction the swipe moved towards. Range (-180, 180)

Conditions:
- `DirectionMoved_4way` - the direction value for 4 sides (UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT). In this case, the “circle” is divided into 4 segments of 90 degrees
- `DirectionMoved_8way` - the direction value for 8 sides (UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT, UP-LEFT, UP-RIGHT, DOWN-LEFT, DOWN-RIGHT). In this case, the “circle” is divided into 8 segments of 45 degrees.
name: SwipeGesture
shortDescription: Detect swipe gestures based on their distance and duration

events.name: Detect if a new swipe started

eventsFunctions.description: Detect swipe gestures.
eventsFunctions.name: DetectSwipeGestures
eventsFunctions.sentence: Detect swipe gestures made by _PARAM1_ button (Layer: _PARAM2_)

parameters.description: Button used to perform swipe (Use "Left" for touchscreen)
parameters.name: InputButton

eventsFunctions.description: Draw a line that indicates the current swipe gesture.
eventsFunctions.name: DrawSwipe
eventsFunctions.sentence: Draw the current swipe with _PARAM1_ using a line that is _PARAM2_ pixels thick

parameters.description: Shape painter used to draw swipe
parameters.name: ShapePainterObject

eventsFunctions.description: Change the minimum distance a swipe must travel to be considered valid.  Use "0" to disable distance restriction.
eventsFunctions.name: SetMinDistance
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the swipe minimum distance to _PARAM1_ pixels

eventsFunctions.description: Change the maximum duration a swipe can exist and still be considered valid.  Use "0" to disable time restriction.
eventsFunctions.name: SetMaxDuration
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the swipe maximum duration to _PARAM1_ seconds
